summary: Chris was inpired to make his game library page by me.  Then he went and added PSN trophy details so I became inspired to do the same - and also do Xbox achievements.  I don't tend to chase getting trophies or achievements but it's nice to be able to see them all in one place anyway...
title: Fetching Achievements and Trophies for my Game Collection Page

summary: If you read this with any regularity then you may know we went live with new Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) software.  Overall, the roll out went well.
